rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may put an artifact card with mana value 5 or less from your hand onto the battlefield. If it’s a Vehicle, it gains haste. At the beginning of the next end step, put that card on the bottom of your library. If you do, draw a card.
special_text:
First mate–Your starting deck contains an artifact card with each mana value among 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5. [i](If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)[/i]
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may put an artifact card with mana value 5 or less from your hand onto the battlefield. If it’s a Vehicle, it gains haste. At the beginning of the next end step, put that card on the bottom of your library. If you do, draw a card.
